title: Mounted By The Mountie
description: When Liam goes on a trip to the Rockies, the last thing he expected was that he would get so lost in the snowy forest, near to his cabin. He also wasn't expecting to be offered a ride on horseback from a member of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police.  But as Liam clutches on to the strong man tightly as the horse gallops through the snow, he soon realizes that the Mountie isn't going to take him back just yet. He has a big surprise he wants to give to the young man, and fertile Liam is going to end up getting saddled...    *** Includes Free Bonus Stories! ***
author: Amanda Bliss
